contents:
其实这事情一开始英国警方自己讲的，然后英国媒体（例如BBC）传开来的，我给你们看BBC的新闻。

2019年10月24日，BBC，《Essex lorry deaths: 39 found dead were Chinese nationals》
https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-essex-50162617

2019年11月4日,BBC，《Essex lorry deaths: What we know》
https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-50159748
“Police initially believed the victims to be Chinese nationals but they have now said they believe they were all from Vietnam.”

39名死者是中国人的消息最初是英国警方自己说的,然后英国警方又改口了....
